## IPackageManager.pack() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

packs payload with a packer that is assigned to media type forwards packer params to implementation

**Signature:**

```typescript
pack(mediaType: MediaType, payload: Uint8Array, params: PackerParams): Promise<Uint8Array>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mediaType | [MediaType](./js-sdk.constants.mediatype.md) |  |
|  payload | Uint8Array |  |
|  params | [PackerParams](./js-sdk.packerparams.md) |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Uint8Array&gt;

`Promise<Uint8Array>`
